EmailTemplate.name: RE: Collier County PS Strategic Plan for 2017 (1497536064.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Collier County PS Strategic Plan for 2017 (1497536064.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Tom – Following up on the emails below, I wanted to see if you would be open to having an introductory call to discuss Turbonomic and how we can help alleviate the challenges IT teams face when trying to optimize their on premise and cloud infrastructure. We just released our 5.9 edition of Turbonomic, which allows our customers to not only optimize their on premise infrastructure, but also allows customers to plan for hybrid cloud migrations and control costs associated with spinning up instances in an AWS or Azure. 5.9 Webinar Release <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbnr-turbonomic-5-9-release-webinar/]]> Do you have 30 minutes over the next couple of weeks to discuss further? Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Monday, May 15, 2017 8:49 AM To: 'petryth@collierschools.com' <petryth@collierschools.com> Subject: RE: Collier County PS Strategic Plan for 2017 Hi Tom, With the large investment you and the team have made in virtualization I think that there could be a lot of potential value that you could see after implementing Turbonomic. Below is a video that BMC and Turbonomic released last week where the CIO, Scott Crowder discusses how Turbonomic allows them to increase the capacity of the infrastructure by 25% while also increasing the performance of the mission critical applications. https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/cloud-economics-on-prem-or-off-with-turbonomic-bmc/ <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jE5TeM3LLFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhWGUCnSzj6oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5yghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSNr16H30jryDaXGGVT7%2Dy%5F30iSK7dnos5Qt28u0QEKSdXu2QLxzpMBpSwC78Z9oD8%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmjl3dget0XRS2SiwAE%5FnYjh%5Fhe74TeqCycXijuHALTmCf%2DxQzzG5cAy1WGsvkStCnaGxXs8rZ3UHKMCauZ6gg%2C/j0xYdMzLL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90xaeaLBU8VEJ9vzwFRGfPYc44N6udYBgy9SnbwhqeXeIRaeflnydNj8Kaq1WkG59%2DPkROTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5MGcTqI3EmQYpM6nQQJvbUI3LaYfImh%5FGeM21zh%5FjuCZ1JX0dKCw2mbJZhmrtBE7GVhu3Q%2C]]> This can help you and the team free up budget for other areas of IT and allows teams to spend less on hardware year over year. Do you have time for my team and I to provide an introduction to the platform over the next couple of weeks? I am confident you will find it valuable. Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Monday, May 8, 2017 10:36 AM To: 'petryth@collierschools.com' <petryth@collierschools.com <[[mailto:petryth@collierschools.com]]>> Subject: RE: Collier County PS Strategic Plan for 2017 Hi Tom, Following up on the email below, I wanted to see if you had any time this week or next to have an introduction discussion around how Turbonomic can help in the following areas: · Defer hardware costs out of the infrastructure by increasing VM to host densities.· Increase performance around VDI environment by 35%. After speaking with other members of your team I’ve heard that you have 16,000 VDI seats that you are managing today and I was hoping to discuss how Turbonomic delivers better performance around each area of the infrastructure including VDI. Do you have 15-30 minutes this week or next for an initial discussion? Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Wednesday, April 26, 2017 8:26 AM To: 'petryth@collierschools.com' <petryth@collierschools.com <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jE1WeMHKLFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhNDlWgQS%5F3oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5wghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSa8lyXxBf%5FvhDbGGVx7u%2DRy0iSK6NjofRR6m4TxUkKStXu2jjqk5ERmysUweh%2Dtz8%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmgk21YUPMefBidnxhxnT4j25oM96%5FahQa3RijpMgaumyev2za5C7AA5VKHsvga8yneEBrD28oweGT8U6uZ6gg%2C/h0xRc8fIdlBQuVN5seycNrv0iz3geZekt7V4G%2DTl2sAx1VswcePCZ0zknOxFE5lvN%5FGrICkqGbNgkT52CrHAddQZ4%5FRxCnm6VDHbs6DgeopaXZpr%2D9Nv8%5Fum8lUWs%5FS3tXXNBXoJBSJIIVW5]]>> Subject: Collier County PS Strategic Plan for 2017 Tom – After looking through your strategic plans for 2014 – 2017 there was a couple of pieces that jumped out at me in the “Decrease server provision time by 95%’, and 2009-2010 VMware Server ” sections of the plan. It seems that you and the team made a point to use virtualization to increase the capacity of the underlying infrastructure without creating any kind of service interruptions. Continuing on that point, I wanted to discuss with you how Turbonomic allows teams to create an even tighter VM to host density ratio across every cluster while also allowing for an increase in application performance and better delivery of service. It does this by using our patented economic scheduling engine that allows for applications to dictate the resources they need in real time, rather than looking at the supply/hardware and historical data. Relevant example - Seminole County Public Schools: <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE1WecbIKFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhNDlWgQS%5F3oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5wghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYeO9kqX0Bbp2BDfGGZUsey820iSKLhytd5Qt28T3UcKSdXvzQH1ypI%5Fhy8Vp8J%2Dty8%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmgk21YUPMefBidnxhxnT4j25oM96%5FahQa3RijpMgaumyev2za5C7AA5VKHsvga8yneEBrD28oweGT8U6uZ6gg%2C/j0tTcsPJL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpxd9z2kdwZunBLA76mN9eHZYhKt2LEwAfHZ9syQ8VKcOlT81z7%5FZeDlKhFQjrj7PDIZ1Kd%2Dt%2D19Ve66euhTIdn%5FypqFbvCB48bmE9MQ%5FJMKYhqDzfOJwpezCGwG7GIasNhA8ai7FX1biebqqdzlSJ9Ejz63DdEBQuwA%2C%2C]]>With Turbonomic’s real-time capacity management to simulate a migration from old Dell hosts to new Cisco UCS blades, the team learned they could consolidate from 12 hosts down to 3, enabling them to save nearly $80,000. These funds can now be reallocated to new projects focused on innovation, such as collapsing and centralizing much of their remote site infrastructure to enable more unified IT management. Do you have 30 minutes over the next few weeks for an introduction demonstration of how this is possible? Best, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE1WecbIKFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhNDlWgQS%5F3oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5wghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYeO9kqX0Bbp2BDfGGZUsey820iSKLhytd5Qt28T3UcKSdXvzQH1ypI%5Fhy8Vp8J%2Dty8%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmgk21YUPMefBidnxhxnT4j25oM96%5FahQa3RijpMgaumyev2za5C7AA5VKHsvga8yneEBrD28oweGT8U6uZ6gg%2C/j0lWeMXLKllNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%5FKjgaMJEw8iJIS7WcKNlZ%2D9lcM0m%2DUh%5FMgZvPaJliX6xUzs9trKuP7XMcg%2Dilu13APEhLE1UpNyLeZbA3gS%2DqOZ4lTQKU7mnUNpM2ji1FhrIXwoE%2C]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE1WecbIKFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhNDlWgQS%5F3oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5wghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYeO9kqX0Bbp2BDfGGZUsey820iSKLhytd5Qt28T3UcKSdXvzQH1ypI%5Fhy8Vp8J%2Dty8%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmgk21YUPMefBidnxhxnT4j25oM96%5FahQa3RijpMgaumyev2za5C7AA5VKHsvga8yneEBrD28oweGT8U6uZ6gg%2C/h0xSdsXOdlBQuVN5sfaYL6z%2D0SLJdpuno5xpHOXk3cEx1EF9PO%5FANR7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpCwV1qNPDEKYkUo%2DxcJ0CKUDf1pJLbVZhJZZhdxOZz8aT220owucSrp3vlCEM7RzQ%5FQEPOTQ%2C%2C]]>
